channel.title: pandas on 'Moais blog
channel.description: Recent content in pandas on 'Moais blog

item.title: Pickle
item.description: pickleの使用方法 Saving with openでの保存、読み込み with open("filename.pkl", "wb") as f: pickle.dump(data, f) with open("filename.pkl", "rb") as f: hoge = pickle.load(f) pandasでの保存、読み込み import pandas as pd pd.to_pickle(data, "filename.pkl") hoge = pd.read_pickle("filename.pkl") joblib(?)での保存、読み込み joblib.dump(data, "filename.jb", compress=3) hoge = joblib.load("filename.jb")
